meta.title: Test MiniGro in Amsterdam | Hands-on Microgreen Growing Demo
meta.description: Book a hands-on MiniGro session. See it in action, taste fresh microgreens, and discover workflow, installation, and real savings.

hero.title: Come test MiniGro in Amsterdam
hero.subtitle: See MiniGro up close, taste fresh microgreens, and ask any questions during a short, no-pressure test session.
bullets: See MiniGro operating in real conditions
Taste microgreens harvested on the spot
Get answers about usage, installation, and savings
hero.reassurance: You can operate, harvest, and taste from MiniGro yourself.

outcome.title: What you'll walk away with
bullets: Clear understanding of installation & space requirements
Exact savings based on your kitchen's usage

calendar.fallback: Can't find a suitable time? Contact us at info@grovero.com

bookingReassurance.noSales: No sales pitch. Just a practical test session.
bookingReassurance.hostedBy: Hosted by the Grovero team in Amsterdam.
